title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Autumn afternoon – Burlington, Connecticut
content:
Photo submitted by Jeremy Lucas, “Burlington, Connecticut – An awesome autumn afternoon of singletrack, fall colors, and occasional bombardment by falling acorns. Helmets have more uses than you’d think.” We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and are happy to share them with our readers around the world here on the Pic Of

The post Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Autumn afternoon – Burlington, Connecticut appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Kristi Benedict
